utta#rEqShvaha#H svaqmutOq&rvA~jcO# gRuhyantE &BiqjityaiqvEmAM ~MlOqkAn puna#riqmaM ~MlOqkaM praqtyava#rOhantiq yat pUrvEqShvaha#H sviqtaH parA$~jcO gRuqhyantEq tasmA#diqtaH parA$~jca iqmE lOqkA yadutta#rEqShvaha#H svaqmutOq&rvA~jcO# gRuqhyantEq tasmA#daqmutOq &rvA~jca# iqmE lOqkAstasmAqdayA#tayAmnO lOqkAn ma#nuqShyA# 
upa# jIvanti brahmavAqdinO# vadantiq kasmA$th saqtyAdaqdBya OSha#dhayaqH saM Ba#vaqntyOSha#dhayO - [  ]   17
